description: Simple crêpe recipe with the best balanced ingredients of white choc and strawberries.
name: Strawberry & White Chocolate Crêpe Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 80g strawberries, washed, drained, hulled and quartered

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the milk, vanilla, eggs, salt and sugar and combine fully.
Incrementally add the flour to the mix so that the mixture doesn't become too heavy and stays a little runny.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat with a little butter and pour 1/8 of the mixture onto the pan (you should get 8 pancakes from this batter).
Tilt the pan around so that the batter fills the pan fully and fry for 2 minutes.
After 2 minutes, flip the crêpe over and fry for 2 more minutes.
Remove from the heat, add your toppings with the cream either in the centre or on top. Suggested to fold or roll before serving.
